# 5th Golden Melody Awards

| location       = Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan
| host           = Johnny ChaoRegina Tsang

The 5th Golden Melody Awards ceremony () was held at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall in Taipei on November 20, 1993.
